description: This file defines a React component named Sidebar along with a subcomponent NavItem. The Sidebar component renders a sidebar navigation menu with several links, and NavItem is a helper component for individual links with active state styling. The code uses Next.js routing hooks to determine the current path and apply styling accordingly.

methods.name: NavItem
methods.description: A React component representing a navigation item that links to a specified href and indicates active state based on current pathname.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: Default React component rendering a sidebar with navigation links.
